Reviews.Title: “good location. lacks basics more like 2 star”
Reviews.Author: funexplorer777
Reviews.Content: pros - good location, comfortable rooms if not near by the busy road. staff were generally friendly. cons - fitness centre was a joke. only had a tread mill and bench for sit ups! lack of variety at breakfast. poor internet connection.

Reviews.Title: “Excecllent Location and Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: bob_devas
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is located in a very good place that is easily accessible to the top attractions of Turkey. The Aksaray tram station is 5mins walk from the Hotel. The room was very comfortable as with all the other amenities. They even have a jacuzzi and sauna facility at the basement which however comes at a cost not covered in your stay. The staff were very helpful at the reception and at the breakfast. Would recommend this hotel for a stay at Istanbul. The only flip side is the steep charges.

Reviews.Title: “Very good choice”
Reviews.Author: bgdnenad
Reviews.Content: Very clean and nicely decorated hotel, with nice staff. Good buffet breakfast, wifi and wellness/spa section. Looks on on rather busy street not very fancy but the location is good since bus stop is just in front of the hotel and tram (which are very good to get you to the tourist destination) is some 200m down the street. Just ask in advance if spa is included in the price since I was asked to pay for it as some other guest did, but I had it covered since it was offered as the free service when I booked the hotel (not he massage of course)

Reviews.Title: “clean and nice location”
Reviews.Author: MikeBucharest
Reviews.Content: service was good ,room was large and bright enough very clean Location is very good also

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Bulvar Palas”
Reviews.Author: Batin
Reviews.Content: First time I was there... How it was very lovely, comfortable and with all staff the atmosphere was wonderful. I liked the room very much , it was good decoreted and big enough. Lobby and bar also nice , quite and relaxable... ( not very crowded and much noice ) And also the breakfast was delicious and rich selection... I enjoyed too much... Bulvar Palas Hotel would be my second home adress when I come to Istanbul again... Definitely I recommend this hotel to everey one...

Reviews.Title: “Stay in Bulvar Palas”
Reviews.Author: Helen1971
Reviews.Content: - At business center kindly help me to send fax. Thank you very much. - I've heard about this hotel from my boyfriend, he said he enjoyed very much and I enjoyed so much too.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Bulvar”
Reviews.Author: Johnny4000
Reviews.Content: The rooms all smell terribly of smoke, this is probably standard in Turkey but it seemed terrible in our upgraded room in this supposedly 4 star hotel. Every morning we woke up with sore throats that stayed with us for days afterwards. Staff inflexible and not very good with Western tourists. Otherwise a good location.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Appalling”
Reviews.Author: WilliamBilson
Reviews.Content: This is the most appalling 4 star hotel I have stayed in - service is non existent, the rooms and all common areas reek of smoke and the food is barely edible....expect to be eating stale cakes, bread and the previous nights soup for breakfast.
